job title: Data Scientist III (Predictive Modeling and Machine Learning for Inventory Management Research)
job description:
Responsible for analyzing new statistical modeling techniques to better align inventory within the Caterpillar and Caterpillar Dealer network.

Requires a Masters in Economics, Mathematics, or Statistics and 2 yrs Inventory Management systems experience: (i) programming in SAS to analyze big data; and (ii) analyzing predictive modeling, linear programming, and machine learning techniques.

Alternatively, would accept a Bachelor’s in Economics, Mathematics, or Statistics and 5 yrs Inventory Management systems experience: (i) programming in SAS to analyze big data; and (ii) analyzing predictive modeling, linear programming, and machine learning techniques.
